SELECT eci.EVBUS_CAR_NO , eci.CUST_ID , eci.STOP_YN , eci.ACC_YN , ct.PROVIDER_ID , ct.B_ID
FROM evbus_card_info eci INNER JOIN cust ct ON eci.CUST_ID = ct.CUST_ID AND eci.EVBUS_MEMSH_CARD_NO = #{memAuthInputNo} WHERE eci.DEL_YN ='N'

SELECT PRICE
FROM rechg_price_info
WHERE 1=1
AND PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId}
AND COST_SDD <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND COST_EDD >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
